greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: Sum_{k >= 1} x^k/(1-x^k)^(k+1).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms 1..999 from Harvey P. Dale)
formula: If p is prime then a(p)=p+1.
a(n) = Sum_{d|n} binomial(d-1+n/d,d). - _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 21 2009
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 21 2003
